snippet.title: Kingpin Bowling (Official Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
The scene: 1979 Iowa State Bowling Championship. Primetime is your middle name, and the pressure is right up your alley. After all, it's how you roll. But keep your mind out of the gutter, pal. It's down to this: Munson, McCraken, The Jesus, and you.

Kingpin Bowling is an endless arcade bowling game with a bevy of cute characters to keep you dancing on the tips of your bowling shoes. Avoid giant hotdogs, gargantuan soda pops, oversizes clipboards, massive pencils, flying popcorn, and a few surprises, all while knocking down pins in the fast lane to the State Championship.

Kingpin Bowling features:

• Simple one touch controls
• Epic bonus rounds
• Randomly generated gameplay to keep it fresh
• Un-lockable balls like El Diablo, El Scorcho and more
• Share GIFS of sweet runs
• Kids mode 
• iPhone X optimized 
• Haptic feedback
• Dope iMessage stickers
• Over a dozen achievements and high scores
